top_security_events.txt2_3: 3. Often a compromised or hacked pod will have multiple process and file system incidents as the hacker tries to install malicious code or vulnerable packages and/or start suspicious processes. Pods can be quarantined or a packet capture started by UranusCS.
top_security_events.txt4_3: 3. Often a compromised or hacked pod will have multiple process and file system incidents as the hacker tries to install malicious code or vulnerable packages and/or start suspicious processes. Pods can be quarantined or a packet capture started by UranusCS.

top_incident_pod.txt2: How to Use It: Often a compromised or hacked pod will have multiple process and file system incidents as the hacker tries to install malicious code or vulnerable packages and/or start suspicious processes. Pods can be quarantined or a packet capture started by UranusCS.

group.CRITERIA_HINT: Sample: container=myServer, namespace!=default, node=ubuntu*, image=*nginx*, address=216.58.194.0/24, address=0.0.0.0/0, address=0.0.0.0-255.255.255.255, address=*.uranuscs.com, container~k8s_zoo[12] or key=value for label ("=" exactly match, "!" not, "? and *" wildcards, "~" regex)

msg.CLUSTER_ROLE_NOT_CONFIG: The uranuscs-binding-admission clusterrole/clusterrolebinding required for UranusCS Admission Control is not configured correctly.
msg.WEBHOOK_NOT_CONFIG: The uranuscs-svc-admission-webhook service required for UranusCS Admission Control is not configured correctly.
msg.NO_UPD_PROMISSION: UranusCS default service account doesn't have UPDATE permission for service resource.

server.APPLY_DESC: Enter code received from UranusCS support

ldap.ADMIN_HINT: Add LDAP/AD groups which map to UranusCS admin

ldap.CI_HINT: Add LDAP/AD groups which map to UranusCS CI Integration
ldap.BASE_DN_HINT: Root node in LDAP/AD from which to search users and groups. e.g. dc=securitysuite, dc=com

okta.CI_HINT: Add SAML groups which map to UranusCS CI Integration
